title: Minecraft 13w49a 启动后报错
author: one杰不复
txt_content:
本帖最后由 one杰不复 于 2013-12-6 23:59 编辑 

官方启动器，启动后出现游戏界面，但一会儿又弹回启动界面，并报错如下：[18:54:40 INFO]: Client> #
[18:54:40 INFO]: Client> # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
[18:54:40 INFO]: Client> #
[18:54:40 INFO]: Client> #  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000007fef4cd0004, pid=3712, tid=5208
[18:54:40 INFO]: Client> #
[18:54:40 INFO]: Client> # JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (7.0_45-b18) (build 1.7.0_45-b18)
[18:54:40 INFO]: Client> # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (24.45-b08 mixed mode windows-amd64 compressed oops)
[18:54:40 INFO]: Client> # Problematic frame:
[18:54:40 INFO]: Client> # C  0x000007fef4cd0004
[18:54:40 INFO]: Client> #
[18:54:40 INFO]: Client> # Failed to write core dump. Minidumps are not enabled by default on client versions of Windows
[18:54:40 INFO]: Client> #
[18:54:40 INFO]: Client> # An error report file with more information is saved as:
[18:54:40 INFO]: Client> # C:\Users\******\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\hs_err_pid3712.log
[18:54:40 INFO]: Client> #
[18:54:40 INFO]: Client> # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:
[18:54:40 INFO]: Client> #   http://bugreport.sun.com/bugreport/crash.jsp
[18:54:40 INFO]: Client> # The crash happened outside the Java Virtual Machine in native code.
[18:54:40 INFO]: Client> # See problematic frame for where to report the bug.
[18:54:40 INFO]: Client> #
[18:54:40 INFO]: Client> AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed
[18:54:40 ERROR]: Game ended with bad state (exit code 1)
[18:54:40 INFO]: Deleting C:\Users\******\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\versions\13w49a\13w49a-natives-4376498319113
[18:54:40 INFO]: Ignoring visibility rule and showing launcher due to a game crash
[18:54:40 WARN]: Couldn't delete C:\Users\******\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\versions\13w49a\13w49a-natives-4376498319113 - scheduling for deletion upon exit
离线状态下不会弹出报错并能正常游戏，求解！
（现在1.7.3也出现了同样的情况）
感谢！

replies.author: zhh0000zhh
replies.txt_content: 你是不是XP，我猜可能和twitch有关的说。。

replies.author: one杰不复
replies.txt_content:
zhh0000zhh 发表于 2013-12-7 11:07 
你是不是XP，我猜可能和twitch有关的说。。
win7 sp1 x64，twitch的确是连不上

replies.author: zhh0000zhh
replies.txt_content:
one杰不复 发表于 2013-12-7 18:08 
win7 sp1 x64，twitch的确是连不上
检查一下OpenAL驱动以及游戏内存分配是否过小

replies.author: one杰不复
replies.txt_content:
zhh0000zhh 发表于 2013-12-7 18:13 
检查一下OpenAL驱动以及游戏内存分配是否过小
这应该都没问题，离线模式是可以启动的，连上网就报错打不开了，现在1.7.4正式版同样情况了。。。

replies.author: zhh0000zhh
replies.txt_content:
one杰不复 发表于 2013-12-10 19:51 
这应该都没问题，离线模式是可以启动的，连上网就报错打不开了，现在1.7.4正式版同样情况了。。。
试试我的启动器，twitch登陆

replies.author: one杰不复
replies.txt_content:
zhh0000zhh 发表于 2013-12-10 19:54 
试试我的启动器，twitch登陆
试了，正版登录还是不行，离线就可以，Twitch登录没试

replies.author: zhh0000zhh
replies.txt_content:
one杰不复 发表于 2013-12-10 20:55 
试了，正版登录还是不行，离线就可以，Twitch登录没试
那我真心不知道了。。。
